meanings.sent1: The ortolans chirped merrily in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of ortolans flitting among the trees.
meanings.sent3: The ortolans held a singing competition in the treetops.
meanings.sent4: The ortolans' colorful feathers resembled a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The tiny ortolans added a touch of magic to the woodland scene.

meanings.definition: A delicacy consisting of a small bird, typically a bunting, that is eaten whole.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a dish of roasted ortolans for the feast.
meanings.sent2: Gourmets savor the unique flavor of ortolans as a culinary delight.
meanings.sent3: At the fancy restaurant, ortolans were served with a side of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The ortolans on the plate symbolized indulgence and luxury.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasted ortolans filled the room with temptation.
